plugin.name: Aardwords_Imm_Helper
plugin.author: Robbo
plugin.purpose: Helps check and confirm words for aardwords
plugin.description:
Usage:
This script watches the debuginfo for people checking words, so you don't have to type the playername or word.
awcheck: This will launch the Scrabble dictionary website in your default browser pointed at the word that was looked up. Easy for checking for valid words.
awconfirm: Confirms the last entered word for that player. It'll make a popup window that forces you to click "OK".

trigger.match: ^\#\#\# \(Debug\) \: Debuginfo\: aylor\-7 line\: 117\, (.*?) is checking the word \'(.*?)\' with the WordSmith\!$
trigger.name: Aardwords_Capture

alias.send:
local word = GetVariable('AardwordsWord')
Note("Launching browser lookup for word "..word) OpenBrowser ("https://scrabble.merriam.com/finder/"..word)

local player = GetVariable('AardwordsPlayer') local word = GetVariable('AardwordsWord')
Note("This will confirm the word "..word.." for player "..player)
response = utils.msgbox ("Go ahead?", "Question", "yesno", "?")
if response == "yes" then Send("doat aylor-190 aardwords "..player.." "..word.." confirm") else Note("Cancelling.") end
